tool_description: Its simple as that just send message and a delivery email and thats all
name: SimpleMailSender
title: SimpleMailSender

api_list.name: SendMail
api_list.description:
It needs two parameters a  Mensjae variable that is text, this is the message on the email that you will send 
and the other is Correo_Delivery that will be the email destination

required_parameters.name: Correo_Delivery
required_parameters.description: The email u want to be delivered the message

required_parameters.name: Mensjae
required_parameters.description: the message of the email that u will send
